This game was good at the start, I know I only started playing since the update, but I do remember when my siblings would play this game in the past. I have lost my progress once and it took a week to gain it back. The cost of the cars has increased by so much. The fact that you need CARDS to upgrade my level C car is a complete turn off. And when they gift you 200k fusions, you realize that you can ONLY get a D class car. This Is really annoying, and plus, don't get me started with the little amount of tokens you get per race. I get less than 2,000 tokens. I know there's a reason why they let you triple or double up the total amount of tokens you got, but they almost never work for me. I play on laptop, doesn't work. I play on iPad, still no. On phone, don't even bring that up. The amount of tokens you get SHOULD be increased. We spend so much time trying to complete one level of those career tasks, and at least we get SOME money. Then we take multiple tries of trying to win a specific race in the career just to be rewarded 90 tokens? Jeez. Step up your game.

title.label: Great game, but there is a tiny issue

content.label:
I‚Äôve had this game ever since it came out (6yrs) and I love it.  If you have a dream car, it will probably be in this game.  If you‚Äôre a fan of car destruction, get this game.  Whenever you crash a car, every door, hood, trunk, and bumper would fly open or even fall off.  So the crashes are very satisfying.  The gameplay has stayed true for these 6 years, unlike asphalt 9.  Also, from my observations it seems like this game is getting more updates than the sequel.  So uh... that‚Äôs a good sign.  Also, I‚Äôm not a fan of battle passes, but I love the festivals in this game.  So, yes it‚Äôs a battle pass, but people why have the free pass (like me) always get a free car at their 8.  It usually takes 3 days to get to their 8.  I got pretty cool cars for free like the Bugatti Chiron, 2020 Chevrolet Corvette Stingray (my dream car), and a Jaguar.

Now I bet your wondering ‚ÄúwhAt‚Äôs thE tInY IssUe?‚Äù  Good question.  There are tons of adds everywhere, no smoking adds to be precise.  I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs just these ‚ÄúReal Cost‚Äù adds for everyone, or there are other adds for certain players.  There is a way to counter these, turn off your WiFi on your device.  The adds will go away at the cost of being unable to play multiplayer and certain challenges.

Besides the @$$load of adds, this a very good game.  It has been from the start, and it‚Äôs one of the most (probably the most) popular racing games on the AppStore.  So, yah... would recommend.

Thanks for listening to my ted talk.

When I started playing this game, I loved. However, it got boring VERY fast. I thought that the moto blitz was kinda cool but it turns out, you need A credits for pretty much all of the motorcycles! I don‚Äôt think many people are willing to pay money just to get some A credits for a motorcycle. Also, career mode got boring too. After a festival I got a Bugatti which I thought was great but then it turns out I can‚Äôt play with it in career mode because it is in the S section. The only way I could play with the Bugatti is by doing a quick race. Again almost all the awesome cars need A credits! I know that this is an incentive for buying A credits using real money but I‚Äôd appreciate if Gameloft would at least make some of the good cars cost C credits. Even if it‚Äôs for a higher price. I don‚Äôt mind. All in all I thought this game was good but it would be nice if you took my suggestions into consideration. Thank you Gameloft.
